com.github.uberroot.ncjbot - package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot
This package contains the classes that form the core of NCJBot.
com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api - package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api
This package contains the API for building applications on top of NCJBot.
com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi - package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi
This package contains the interfaces and classes required to build modules.
com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modules - package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modules
This package contains several default modules.
ConfigManager - Class in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot
This class is responsible for loading, maintaining, and retrieving configuration data.
ConfigManager(LocalNode, File) - Constructor for class com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.ConfigManager
Creates a ConfigManager and loads the configuration for the file specified.
configManager - Variable in class com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.LocalNode
The ConfigManager for this node.
ConfigManager.EventListener - Interface in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot
An interface that listens for configuration changes.
configuration - Variable in class com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.ConfigManager
The table of sections, which in turn are tables of settings.
connectionClosed(ConnectionFactory.Connection) - Method in interface com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi.ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener
Indicates the connection closed gracefully.
ConnectionFactory - Interface in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi
This interface defines the API for establishing and utilizing connections with other nodes, abstracting the underlying socket usage.
ConnectionFactory.Connection - Interface in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi
This interface defines the functionality for utilizing a connection with a RemoteNode.
ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener - Interface in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi
A listener for events that may occur with the connection.
connectionFailed(ConnectionFactory.Connection) - Method in interface com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi.ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener
Indicates the connection closed prematurely.
